Literature.Title: The pharmacophore of short cationic antibacterial peptides.
Literature.Author: Strøm MB, Haug BE, Skar ML, Stensen W, Stiberg T, Svendsen JS

Literature.Title: Synthesis and in Silico Modelling of the Potential Dual Mechanistic Activity of Small Cationic Peptides Potentiating the Antibiotic Novobiocin against Susceptible and Multi-Drug Resistant Escherichia coli.
Literature.Author: Passarini I, Resende PE, Soares S, Tahmasi T, Stapleton P, Malkinson J, Zloh M, Rossiter S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=100µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12981(MIC=>128µg/ml)
